title: hmcl打不开游戏
author: Lonely丶齐天
txt_content:

replies.author: 大天天
replies.txt_content:
应该是forge在加载什么东西，等一等呢？不行的话试下更新或者换个启动器：
bakaxl：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-512144-1-1.html
hmcl：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... peid%26typeid%3D908

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 等，这个窗口是 forge 在预先加载一些东西，等就行了

replies.author: Lonely丶齐天
replies.txt_content: 我又等了2个多小时还么好

replies.author: chuangshigame
replies.txt_content: forge加载界面，请更换启动器·

replies.author: 落尘秋风
replies.txt_content: 实在不行换个启动器吧

replies.author: Tr、不帆
replies.txt_content: 要么就是错误或者确实文件

replies.author: Tr、不帆
replies.txt_content: 你重装或者换一个启动器吧
